stimulusHtml: The composition and placement of Rodin’s The Burghers of Calais are intended to elicit which of the following responses from its viewers?

features.html:
The question refers to the image shown.

© Scala / Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: A sense of victory and national pride
An impression of stillness and death
A personal connection with the individuals depicted
A feeling of awe at the men’s elevated status
